title: How many novels did John Lennon write? - Quora

response.answer_text: He wrote two books, neither one was a novel. They were short stories studded with puns and his drawings. As a teenage Beatles fan I had to have them; as an adult I donated them to my local library.
None, but two books of poems, essays, jokes, short stories and cartoons, “In His Own Write” and “A Spaniard in the Works.”
